meeting_info.organization: Deep Ellum TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Dorcy Clark, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 3 through 7
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the December 6, 2022 Deep Ellum TIF District Board Meeting
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Deep Ellum TIF District Annual Report for FY 2022-2023
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of proposed amendments to the Project Plan and Reinvestment Zone Financing Plan
agenda_items.description: Amendments include budget adjustments and new categories for affordable housing.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to the City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of proposed amendments to the Deep Ellum TIF District Increment Allocation Policy
agenda_items.description: Amendments to reflect proposed Plan amendments and increase the annual District-Wide Improvement Set-Aside.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a regular meeting schedule for the Deep Ellum TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2024

financial_items.description: Increase the total budget for the Deep Ellum TIF District
financial_items.amount: $46,408,080 net present value (approximately $93,519,023 in total dollars)

financial_items.description: Remove the Latino Cultural Center Area Improvements budget category
Set Aside 20% of annual Deep Ellum TIF District net increment for infrastructure improvements
